briefdescription.para: Requires #define DEBUG or -DDEBUG in the compile line.

detaileddescription.para: Automatically adds space between each input. Terminate the output with a "\\n"

briefdescription.para: Set the floating point precision displayed.

detaileddescription.para: Concatenate the ouput, i.e. do not add space between each input. Terminate the output with a "\\n"
